title: Mystery Detective
description: Become master detectives! Solve thrilling whodunits with secret codes, evidence, and mind-bending riddles that arrive in every envelope. Perfect for puzzle lovers & curious minds.

title: Time Explorer
description: Travel through time! Immerse yourself in legendary explorers, brave knights, daring civilizations, and enchanted territories. Perfect for history buffs & adventure seekers.

title: A Hero's Journey
description: Meet legendary heroes! Discover inspiring stories of courage, kindness, and determination from remarkable people who changed the world. Perfect for dreamers & future leaders.
